import os, sys
import argparse


[docs]def parse_args(args):
    parser = argparse.ArgumentParser()
    # parameters will be passed to train.py by cmdlind
    # PLEASE define parameter list as below
    # saved_path is generated by hydro.ai, please use this path to save model

    # parser.add_argument('--max_depth', type=int, required=True)
    # parser.add_argument('--learning_rate', type=float, required=True)
    # ...
    #parser.add_argument('--saved_path', type=str, required=True)

    return parser.parse_args(args)
